title: ISectionViewData.SectionedZones
description: Gets or sets the intersection zones that define how to section this section view.
returns: Intersection zones as defined in swZonalSectionViewZones_e (see Remarks )
remarks:
In the SOLIDWORKS API, zones are defined by the intersections of the sectioning planes. This table describes the intersection zones and the enumerators to which they correspond.
Number of sectioning planes
